name: Inception
description: Dominic Cobb is a skilled thief who specializes in extracting information from targets' dreams. To redeem himself, he takes on a nearly impossible task of planting an idea into someone's mind.

name: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces a new adversary, the Joker, who aims to create chaos in Gotham City. Batman, along with Commissioner Gordon and DA Harvey Dent, tries to stop the criminal mastermind's reign of anarchy.

name: Forrest Gump
description: Forrest Gump, a man with a low IQ, recounts his life experiences and unwittingly becomes part of key historical events. His simple goal is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart, Jenny.

name: Shawshank Redemption
description: Andy Dufresne, a banker convicted of a crime he didn't commit, navigates life in Shawshank prison. His friendship with Red and his determination for justice make him an extraordinary inmate.

name: The Godfather
description: Don Vito Corleone, the head of a powerful mafia family, faces challenges as he decides to transfer his empire to his youngest son, Michael. The decision leads to unintended consequences for the family.

name: Pulp Fiction
description: In the criminal underworld, the lives of two hitmen, a gangster's wife, a boxer, and two small-time criminals intertwine in a series of darkly comedic and violent events.

name: Schindler's List
description: Oskar Schindler, a German businessman, becomes increasingly concerned about the safety of his Jewish workforce during World War II. He takes extraordinary measures to save as many lives as possible.

name: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

name: Titanic
description: A love story blossoms on the ill-fated voyage of the R.M.S. Titanic, as it sails towards its tragic end.

name: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a soapmaker form an underground fight club as a form of male bonding.

name: The Lord of the Rings
description: A young hobbit, Frodo Baggins, embarks on a perilous journey to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

name: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet seeks the help of an imprisoned and manipulative cannibal killer to investigate a new serial killer on the loose.

name: The Godfather: Part II
description: The saga of the Corleone crime family continues, as a young Vito Corleone expands his crime empire, while his son Michael faces new challenges.

name: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks justice for his family and revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

name: The Lord of the Rings II
description: The fellowship faces new challenges as they journey further into Middle-earth, encountering new allies and enemies in their quest to destroy the One Ring.
